title:
Detection of broadband squeezed light with a low-noise die-level
  balanced receiver
authors:
Emmily Zaiser, Alessandro Trenti, Dinka Milovan\v{c}ev, Nemanja
  Voki\'c, Bernhard Schrenk, Hannes H\"ubel
abstract:
The generation and detection of squeezed light through spontaneous parametric
down-conversion in a nonlinear crystal up to a frequency of 3.5 GHz is
presented. We characterize the quantum state with balanced homodyne detection,
leveraging a low-noise die-level receiver.
